Funny movie! Thanks FXG...the only issue with this movie is that the audio becomes out of sync about halfway through the movie. Other than that the quality is great.

Owch Curry44 that sucks! Make sure you limit your downloads. No more than 2 movies/ programs a week. And once you get done watching a movie and seeding it, back it up on a disc and delete it and remove the torrent, clear your recycling bin. They only crack down on excessive down loaders.
